com.idega.egov.restful
Interface RestfulEGovServices

All Known Implementing Classes:
RestfulEGovServicesImpl
public interface RestfulEGovServices

Gateway to the e-Gov services via restful web service

Author:
valdas

getCasesByCriteria

javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCasesByCriteria(java.lang.String serviceId,
                                             java.lang.String caseNumber,
                                             java.lang.String description,
                                             java.lang.String name,
                                             java.lang.String personalId,
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> statuses,
                                             java.lang.String dateFrom,
                                             java.lang.String dateTo,
                                             java.lang.String ownerId,
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> groups,
                                             java.lang.Boolean simpleCases,
                                             java.lang.Boolean notGeneralCases)
Searches cases by these parameters. Serviceid must be specified. If any other than serviceId parameter is empty or null than it will not be in search. For example if only parameters serviceId, dateFrom, dateTo and owner are specified than cases will be returned by these parameters. GET: /mobile/egov/cases/criteria

Returns:
collection of cases Case
